short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Persist the canva sidebar open state on reload.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension maintains the open/closed state of the menu sidebar on the Canva web application across reloads. It improves the user experience of the site because the sidebar doesn't need to be closed every time the page is reloaded if it was closed when the page was reloaded.
